title: Breaking Down the ‘Spiderman: No Way Home’ Trailer. Plus, Lauren Mayberry of Chvrches on Their New Album
description:
Chris and Andy talk briefly about the new HBO documentary series ‘100 Foot Wave’ (1:18) before getting into the ‘Spider-Man: No Way Home’ trailer that was released this week (15:09). Then Andy is joined by Lauren Mayberry of Chvrches to talk about the process behind creating the band’s new album, ‘Screen Violence’ (33:05).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Lauren Mayberry
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
